div.a: Title I Parent and Family Engagement Policy

span.a: Title I Parent and Family Engagement Policy

div.h1: Igniting a passion for learning in the next generation.
We will have an Early Release on 1/15/2020, students will dismiss at 12 pm.
The 2nd 9 weeks ends on 1/17/2020. Report Cards go home on 1/24/2020

div.p: Click the photo to download a copy of the flier.

div.h2: Ignite Innovation Academy is excited to announce a new partnership with Jaac and Jill who will be providing before and after school care for our students. Any inquiries regarding before or after school care can be directed to them. Before school care Care will be available from 6:45-7:45 AM and after school care will be from 3:00-6:00 PM. Students may be dropped beginning at 7:30 AM and school dismisses at 3:00 PM.

div.h1: Come and take a tour of our school.
div.h3: Please contact the front office for available times.
